006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.IDataTypeAdapter;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.MetaschemaDataTypeProvider;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.StaticContext;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyUriItem;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IBase64BinaryItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IBooleanItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDateItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDateTimeItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDayTimeDurationItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDecimalItem;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDurationItem;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IEmailAddressItem;
022import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IHostnameItem;
023import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IIPv4AddressItem;
024import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IIPv6AddressItem;
025import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IIntegerItem;
026import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.INcNameItem;
027import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.INonNegativeIntegerItem;
028import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.INumericItem;
029import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IPositiveIntegerItem;
030import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IStringItem;
031import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.ITokenItem;
032import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IUriReferenceItem;
033import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IUuidItem;
034import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IYearMonthDurationItem;
035import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IArrayItem;
036import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IMapItem;
037import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IAssemblyNodeItem;
038import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IDocumentNodeItem;
039import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IFieldNodeItem;
040import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IFlagNodeItem;
041import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.INodeItem;
042import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
043
044import java.util.Arrays;
045import java.util.Collections;
046import java.util.Map;
047import java.util.stream.Stream;
048
049import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
050
051import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
052
053@SuppressWarnings({ "removal", "deprecation" })
054public final class TypeSystem {
055  private static final Map<Class<? extends IItem>, QName> ITEM_CLASS_TO_QNAME_MAP;
056
057  static {
058    ITEM_CLASS_TO_QNAME_MAP = Collections.unmodifiableMap(Map.ofEntries(
059        register(IItem.class, "item"),
060        register(INodeItem.class, "node"),
061        register(IDocumentNodeItem.class, "document-node"),
062        register(IAssemblyNodeItem.class, "assembly-node"),
063        register(IFieldNodeItem.class, "field-node"),
064        register(IFlagNodeItem.class, "flag-node"),
065        register(IArrayItem.class, "array"),
066        register(IMapItem.class, "map"),
067        register(IAnyAtomicItem.class, "any-atomic-type"),
068        register(INumericItem.class, "numeric"),
069        register(IDurationItem.class, "duration"),
070        register(IBase64BinaryItem.class, MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.BASE64),
071        register(IBooleanItem.class, MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.BOOLEAN),
072        register(IDateItem.class, MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.DATE),
073        // register(IDate.class, MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.DATE_WITH_TZ),
074        register(IDateTimeItem.class, MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.DATE_TIME),
075        // register(IBooleanItem.class, MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.DATE_TIME_WITH_TZ),
076        register(IIPv4AddressItem.class, MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.IP_V4_ADDRESS),
077        register(IIPv6AddressItem.class, MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.IP_V6_ADDRESS),
078        register(IAnyUriItem.class, MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.URI),
079        register(IUriReferenceItem.class, MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.URI_REFERENCE),
080        register(IUuidItem.class, MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.UUID),
081        register(IDayTimeDurationItem.class, MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.DAY_TIME_DURATION),
082        register(IYearMonthDurationItem.class, MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.YEAR_MONTH_DURATION),
083        register(IDecimalItem.class, MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.DECIMAL),
084        register(IIntegerItem.class, MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.INTEGER),
085        register(INonNegativeIntegerItem.class, MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.NON_NEGATIVE_INTEGER),
086        register(IPositiveIntegerItem.class, MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.POSITIVE_INTEGER),
087        register(IEmailAddressItem.class, MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.EMAIL_ADDRESS),
088        register(IHostnameItem.class, MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.HOSTNAME),
089        register(INcNameItem.class, MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.NCNAME),
090        register(IStringItem.class, MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.STRING),
091        register(ITokenItem.class, MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.TOKEN)));
092  }
093
094  private static Map.Entry<Class<? extends IItem>, QName> register(
095      @NonNull Class<? extends IItem> clazz,
096      @NonNull IDataTypeAdapter<?> adapter) {
097    return Map.entry(clazz, adapter.getPreferredName());
098  }
099
100  private static Map.Entry<Class<? extends IItem>, QName> register(
101      @NonNull Class<? extends IItem> clazz,
102      @NonNull String typeName) {
103    return Map.entry(clazz, new QName(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH.toASCIIString(), typeName));
104  }
105
106  @NonNull
107  private static Stream<Class<? extends IItem>> getItemInterfaces(@NonNull Class<?> clazz) {
108    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked") Stream<Class<? extends IItem>> retval = IItem.class.isAssignableFrom(clazz)
109        ? Stream.of((Class<? extends IItem>) clazz)
110        : Stream.empty();
111
112    Class<?>[] interfaces = clazz.getInterfaces();
113    if (interfaces.length > 0) {
114      retval = Stream.concat(retval, Arrays.stream(interfaces).flatMap(TypeSystem::getItemInterfaces));
115    }
116
117    return ObjectUtils.notNull(retval);
118  }
119
120  /**
121   * Get the human-friendly data type name for the provided Metapath item class.
122   *
123   * @param clazz
124   *          the Metapath item class to get the name for
125   * @return the name or {@code null} if no name is registered for the item class
126   */
127  public static String getName(@NonNull Class<? extends IItem> clazz) {
128    Class<? extends IItem> itemClass = getItemInterfaces(clazz).findFirst().orElse(null);
129
130    QName qname = ITEM_CLASS_TO_QNAME_MAP.get(itemClass);
131    return qname == null ? clazz.getName() : asPrefixedName(qname);
132  }
133
134  private static String asPrefixedName(@NonNull QName qname) {
135    String namespace = qname.getNamespaceURI();
136    String prefix = namespace.isEmpty() ? null : StaticContext.getWellKnownPrefixForUri(namespace);
137    return prefix == null ? qname.toString() : prefix + ":" + qname.getLocalPart();
138  }
139
140  private TypeSystem() {
141    // disable construction
142  }
143}
